title: 这段指令哪里出错了
author: 我叫小灰灰
txt_content:
这一段哪里有错啊，为什么不是有效数字，版本1.8.2

/summon Spider ~ ~ ~{CustomName:"鬼蛛",Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1300},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:1},{Name:generic.attackdamage,Base:100}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Amplifier:1,Duration:12000},{Id:8,Amplifier:2,Duration:12000},{Id:1,Amplifier:3,Duration:12000}],Equipment:[{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:256},{id:minecraft:nether_star,Count:7,tag:{display:{Name:金币}}},DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F]}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
因为你没有空格 对就是↓这里
/summon Spider ~ ~ ~ {CustomName:"鬼蛛",Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1300},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:1},{Name:generic.attackdamage,Base:100}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Amplifier:1,Duration:12000},{Id:8,Amplifier:2,Duration:12000},{Id:1,Amplifier:3,Duration:12000}],Equipment:[{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:256},{id:minecraft:nether_star,Count:7,tag:{display:{Name:金币}}},DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F]}
